posts.post_title: WTB: T206- Brain, Clancy, Flanagan, Taylor
posts.post_content: Looking to purchase the following Buffalo Bison T206s. No paper loss or markings preferred but open to all honestly. Thanks!
I have a PSA 4 Schirm (Piedmont 350), if you're interested.
Just giving this a bump thank you
